markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Share Rage](/Feats.aspx?ID=154) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Auditory" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=16" />
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=18" />
<trait label="Rage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=135" />
<trait label="Visual" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=163" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 91 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Requirements**
You haven’t used this ability since you last Raged.

</column>

---

You stoke an ally’s fury. While you are raging, one willing creature within 30 feet gains the effects of the Rage action, except it can still use [concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32) actions.

<title level="2">Share Rage leads to...</title>
[Contagious Rage](/Feats.aspx?ID=177)
name: Share Rage
requirement: You haven’t used this ability since you last Raged.
requirement_markdown: You haven’t used this ability since you last Raged.
